const response0 = await client.indices.create({
  index: 'my_index',
  body: {
    mappings: {
      properties: {
        user: {
          type: 'nested'
        }
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response0)

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: 'my_index',
  id: '1',
  body: {
    group: 'fans',
    user: [
      {
        first: 'John',
        last: 'Smith'
      },
      {
        first: 'Alice',
        last: 'White'
      }
    ]
  }
})
console.log(response1)

const response2 = await client.search({
  index: 'my_index',
  body: {
    query: {
      nested: {
        path: 'user',
        query: {
          bool: {
            must: [
              {
                match: {
                  'user.first': 'Alice'
                }
              },
              {
                match: {
                  'user.last': 'Smith'
                }
              }
            ]
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response2)

  index: 'my_index',
  body: {
    query: {
      nested: {
        path: 'user',
        query: {
          bool: {
            must: [
              {
                match: {

                }

    }

})
